trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZJ024_03587_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Nemshs Ooan could use a helping hand with a necessary evil.
TEXT_LUCKZJ024_03587_NEMSHSOOAN_000_000<tab>Greetings, honored guessst. Could you perchance lend an old Ondo a hand with a troublesome hunt?

TEXT_LUCKZJ024_03587_NEMSHSOOAN_000_001<tab>Dagons pose a threat to the young and infirm, for they disguise themselves as rocks and ambush their prey to feed. They must be culled for the good of all, but I alone cannot see this done.
TEXT_LUCKZJ024_03587_NEMSHSOOAN_000_002<tab>Therefore I would ask you to help me in ssslaying the meddlesome pests. A trio should sssuffice. Come and see me when you have finished.
TEXT_LUCKZJ024_03587_NEMSHSOOAN_000_005<tab>You need not slay ten ssscore or some other ungodly amount, my friend. Three dagons alone would be a tremendous help.
TEXT_LUCKZJ024_03587_NEMSHSOOAN_000_010<tab>Say no more, honored guest. The dagons are dead. I can smell their blood on you.

TEXT_LUCKZJ024_03587_NEMSHSOOAN_000_011<tab>Like the Ondo, they too seek to take shhhelter in the ancient ruins. It is a regrettable state of affairs that we must ever ssstrive to keep their numbers in check, else they drive us out of hearth and home.
TEXT_LUCKZJ024_03587_NEMSHSOOAN_000_012<tab>It will only be more difficult to do so in the absence of water...but such is our life now. There is naught to be gained from pining for what was lossst...
